verses.name: Mark 4:5
verses.text: And some fell on stony ground, where it had not much earth; and immediately it sprang up, because it had no depth of earth:

verses.name: Mark 4:6
verses.text: But when the sun was up, it was scorched; and because it had no root, it withered away.

verses.name: Mark 4:7
verses.text: And some fell among thorns, and the thorns grew up, and choked it, and it yielded no fruit.

verses.name: Mark 4:8
verses.text: And other fell on good ground, and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased; and brought forth, some thirty, and some sixty, and some an hundred.
